name: Bag End
description: Not a nasty, dirty, wet hole, filled with the ends of worms and an oozy smell, nor yet a dry, bare, sandy hole with nothing in it to sit down on or to eat: it was a Hobbit-hole, and that means comfort.

name: The Addams Family Mansion
description: Instead of being a dilapidated house, it was now practically a museum filled with odd statues, trophies, and other interesting things.

name: Kame House
description: Kame House is the primary training site of Goku, Krillin, and later Yamcha during the Tournament and Fortuneteller Baba Sagas.

name: The Flintstones House
description: It is a brilliant and appealing architectural organic circular suburban house topped with pancaked granite slab roofs, stone walls and windows that give even more of an all-natural look, including it's wooden doors, and a garage door where Fred parks his Flintmobile in the garage. The interior of the house is filled with Stone-Age-like features from floor to ceiling and even furniture and artwork.
